jsdoc.description: Sniffs buffer encoding, creates querying function bound to document from buffer.

params.name: buffer
params.description: The buffer to sniff the encoding of.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to pass to Cheerio.

jsdoc.description: Parses sequence of strings into document, accepts strings, calls callback with loaded document.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to pass to Cheerio.

params.name: cb
params.description: The callback to call when the stream is finished.

jsdoc.description: Parses stream of buffers into document, accepts buffers, calls callback with loaded document.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to pass to Cheerio.

params.name: cb
params.description: The callback to call when the stream is finished.

jsdoc.description: Loads document from URL, allows redirects, rejects non-2xx responses.

params.name: url
params.description: The URL to load the document from.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to pass to Cheerio.

jsdoc.description: Checks if container node contains contained node.
jsdoc.returns: True if container contains contained, false otherwise.

jsdoc.xaiDescription: Merges two arrays into a new array. Uses ArrayLike<T>.
Loads content into Cheerio. Uses CheerioOptions and CheerioAPI.

types.name: DecodeStreamOptions

properties.name: encoding
properties.xaiDescription: Encoding options for stream decoding. Uses SnifferOptions.

properties.name: xml
properties.xaiDescription: XML parsing option. Can be boolean or HTMLParser2Options.

properties.name: xmlMode
properties.xaiDescription: Enables/disables XML parsing mode.

properties.name: baseURI
properties.xaiDescription: Base URI for resolving relative URLs. Accepts string or URL.

properties.name: quirksMode
properties.xaiDescription: Enables/disables quirks mode for HTML parsing.

properties.name: pseudos
properties.type: Record<string, string | ((elem: Element, value?: string) => boolean)>
properties.xaiDescription: Custom pseudo-selectors for querying elements.

properties.name: scriptingEnabled
properties.xaiDescription: Enables/disables scripting during parsing.

properties.name: sourceCodeLocationInfo
properties.xaiDescription: Enables/disables source code location information.

properties.name: treeAdapter
properties.xaiDescription: Custom tree adapter for parsing. Uses Htmlparser2TreeAdapterMap.

properties.name: onParseError
properties.xaiDescription: Callback for handling parsing errors. Uses ParserErrorHandler.

types.xaiDescription: Options for decoding streams. Extends CheerioOptions.

properties.name: dispatcher
properties.xaiDescription: Custom dispatcher for handling requests. Uses Dispatcher.

properties.name: opaque
properties.xaiDescription: Opaque data for custom use.

properties.name: signal
properties.xaiDescription: Signal for aborting the request.

properties.name: maxRedirections
properties.xaiDescription: Maximum number of redirections allowed.

properties.name: redirectionLimitReached
properties.xaiDescription: Indicates if redirection limit was reached.

properties.name: onInfo
properties.type: (info: { statusCode: number; headers: Record<string, string | string[]>; }) => void
properties.xaiDescription: Callback for receiving response information.

properties.name: responseHeader
properties.xaiDescription: Option to receive raw response headers.

properties.name: highWaterMark
properties.xaiDescription: High water mark for stream buffering.

properties.name: method
properties.xaiDescription: HTTP method for the request. Uses HttpMethod.

properties.name: body
properties.xaiDescription: Request body. Accepts various formats.

properties.name: headers
properties.xaiDescription: Request headers. Accepts various formats.

properties.name: query
properties.xaiDescription: Query parameters for the request.

properties.name: idempotent
properties.xaiDescription: Indicates if the request is idempotent.

properties.name: blocking
properties.xaiDescription: Indicates if the request should be blocking.

properties.name: upgrade
properties.xaiDescription: WebSocket upgrade option.

properties.name: headersTimeout
properties.xaiDescription: Timeout for receiving headers.

properties.name: bodyTimeout
properties.xaiDescription: Timeout for receiving the body.

properties.name: reset
properties.xaiDescription: Indicates if the request should be reset.

properties.name: throwOnError
properties.xaiDescription: Indicates if errors should be thrown.

properties.name: expectContinue
properties.xaiDescription: Indicates if the server should expect a '100 Continue' response.

types.name: CheerioRequestOptions

properties.name: requestOptions
properties.xaiDescription: Request options for Cheerio. Uses UndiciStreamOptions.

properties.name: encoding
properties.xaiDescription: Encoding options for stream decoding. Uses SnifferOptions.

properties.name: xml
properties.xaiDescription: XML parsing option. Can be boolean or HTMLParser2Options.

properties.name: xmlMode
properties.xaiDescription: Enables/disables XML parsing mode.

properties.name: baseURI
properties.xaiDescription: Base URI for resolving relative URLs. Accepts string or URL.

properties.name: quirksMode
properties.xaiDescription: Enables/disables quirks mode for HTML parsing.

properties.name: pseudos
properties.type: Record<string, string | ((elem: Element, value?: string) => boolean)>
properties.xaiDescription: Custom pseudo-selectors for querying elements.

properties.name: scriptingEnabled
properties.xaiDescription: Enables/disables scripting during parsing.

properties.name: sourceCodeLocationInfo
properties.xaiDescription: Enables/disables source code location information.

properties.name: treeAdapter
properties.xaiDescription: Custom tree adapter for parsing. Uses Htmlparser2TreeAdapterMap.

properties.name: onParseError
properties.xaiDescription: Callback for handling parsing errors. Uses ParserErrorHandler.

types.xaiDescription: Options for Cheerio requests. Extends DecodeStreamOptions.

jsdoc.description:
Sniffs the encoding of a buffer, then creates a querying function bound to a
document created from the buffer.

params.name: buffer
params.description: - The buffer to sniff the encoding of.

params.name: options
params.description: - The options to pass to Cheerio.

jsdoc.description:
Creates a stream that parses a sequence of strings into a document.

The stream is a `Writable` stream that accepts strings. When the stream is
finished, the callback is called with the loaded document.

params.name: options
params.description: - The options to pass to Cheerio.

params.name: cb
params.description: - The callback to call when the stream is finished.

jsdoc.description:
Parses a stream of buffers into a document.

The stream is a `Writable` stream that accepts buffers. When the stream is
finished, the callback is called with the loaded document.

params.name: options
params.description: - The options to pass to Cheerio.

params.name: cb
params.description: - The callback to call when the stream is finished.

jsdoc.description:
`fromURL` loads a document from a URL.

By default, redirects are allowed and non-2xx responses are rejected.

params.name: url
params.description: - The URL to load the document from.

params.name: options
params.description: - The options to pass to Cheerio.

functions.name: contains
functions.xaiDescription: Checks if one node contains another. Uses AnyNode.

functions.name: load
functions.xaiDescription: Loads content into a Cheerio document. Uses CheerioAPI.
